Please type out below the exact text of your credit card notification including the price but excluding special characters. For example, if your notification reads \"£33.99 spent today on American Express ****1234\" then input \"£33.99 spent today on American Express 1234\"
You need to add the below url as your redirect uri

To access the Monzo api via this app you need to setup an OAuth client. Go to Monzo Developer Portal and setup a new OAuth client, you will need to set your redirect url to https\:\/\/monzocredit.example.com\/oauth\/callback\/ and set the auth client to confidential so you can get a refresh access token. Once you have setup the client, input the client id and secret and click Login to Monzo, it will redirect you to the Monzo developer login again. This will trigger another email, you should open the link in the email on your phone, this will complete the setup. Do not forget to authorize your client in your Monzo app when prompted to.
